pr_title: Upgrading async profiler version to 1.7.1 and adding safemode config

timeline.message: Adding recover mode to async profiler

timeline.bodyText: This disables all stack trace recoveries by default. Is that intentional?
timeline.author: felixbarny

replies.bodyText:
This is not what I plan to push to master, this is only an analysis agent, where we want to start by testing that the recovery code is not the cause. Only if required, we will ask the user to set this to other values.
I did it as a PR just so I have the artefacts publicly available.
replies.author: eyalkoren

timeline.bodyText: What's the value of testing the different options?
timeline.author: felixbarny

replies.bodyText: Only sanity check that enabling discrete parts of the recovery logic doesn't break anything. Again - not to be eventually merged.
replies.author: eyalkoren
